caption.courtNameFormat: STATE OF MINNESOTA, DISTRICT COURT, {JUDICIAL_DISTRICT} JUDICIAL DISTRICT, COUNTY OF {COUNTY}
caption.sampleTemplate:
STATE OF MINNESOTA
DISTRICT COURT
{JUDICIAL_DISTRICT} JUDICIAL DISTRICT

COUNTY OF {COUNTY}

{PLAINTIFFS},

     Plaintiff(s),

v.

{DEFENDANTS},

     Defendant(s).

Court File No. {CASE_NUMBER}

{MOTION_TITLE}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of Minnesota that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

implementationNotes: Minnesota uses 'Court File No.' as the case label
Caption format includes judicial district AND county
District Court is the trial court of general jurisdiction
